flawed_nl_solution:
Keith's dog ate half of his collection so he had 2 * 46 cards = <<2*46=29>>29 cards before his dog ate them.
Keith had added 8 new cards to his collection so he had 29 cards - 8 = <<29-8=21>>21 cards to start with.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 92, not 29. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
